태초에, 처음에: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='g1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#FF6B35;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF1744;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='g2' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFEA00;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF6F00;stop-opacity:0.8'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow1'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='8' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow1'><feDropShadow dx='0' dy='0' stdDeviation='25' flood-color='#FFD700' flood-opacity='0.8'/></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#g1)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='70' fill='url(#g2)' filter='url(#shadow1)' opacity='0.95'/><path d='M100,40 L120,80 L165,85 L132,115 L142,160 L100,137 L58,160 L68,115 L35,85 L80,80 Z' fill='#FFEA00' filter='url(#glow1)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='35' fill='#FFF' opacity='0.9' filter='url(#glow1)'/><circle cx='85' cy='90' r='8' fill='#FFD700' opacity='1'/><circle cx='115' cy='90' r='8' fill='#FFD700' opacity='1'/><circle cx='100' cy='110' r='12' fill='#FF6F00' opacity='0.95'/></svg>
창조하셨다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='cr1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#00E5FF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#2979FF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#AA00FF;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='cr2' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='30%' style='stop-color:#00FFFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#00BCD4;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow2'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='10' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow2'><feDropShadow dx='0' dy='0' stdDeviation='30' flood-color='#00E5FF' flood-opacity='0.9'/></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#cr1)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='75' fill='url(#cr2)' filter='url(#shadow2)' opacity='0.95'/><path d='M60,100 Q80,60 100,50 Q120,60 140,100 Q120,140 100,150 Q80,140 60,100 Z' fill='#00FFFF' filter='url(#glow2)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='100' cy='70' r='15' fill='#FFEA00' filter='url(#glow2)'/><circle cx='80' cy='110' r='12' fill='#76FF03' filter='url(#glow2)'/><circle cx='120' cy='110' r='12' fill='#FF4081' filter='url(#glow2)'/><path d='M100,85 L105,95 L95,95 Z' fill='#FFF' opacity='1'/></svg>
하나님: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='god1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='25%' style='stop-color:#FFEA00;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='75%' style='stop-color:#00E5FF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2979FF;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='god2' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#FFEA00;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:0.9'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow3'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='12' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow3'><feDropShadow dx='0' dy='0' stdDeviation='35' flood-color='#FFEA00' flood-opacity='1'/></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#god1)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='80' fill='url(#god2)' filter='url(#shadow3)' opacity='1'/><path d='M100,30 L110,70 L150,70 L120,95 L135,135 L100,110 L65,135 L80,95 L50,70 L90,70 Z' fill='#FFF' filter='url(#glow3)' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='25' fill='#FFEA00' opacity='1' filter='url(#glow3)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='15' fill='#FFF' opacity='0.95'/><path d='M100,50 L105,60 L95,60 Z' fill='#00E5FF' filter='url(#glow3)'/><path d='M70,100 L80,105 L80,95 Z' fill='#FF4081' filter='url(#glow3)'/><path d='M130,100 L120,105 L120,95 Z' fill='#76FF03' filter='url(#glow3)'/></svg>
~을/를 (목적격 표지): <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='ar1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF4081;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#FF6E40;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFEA00;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='ar2' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF6E40;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow4'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='8' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow4'><feDropShadow dx='0' dy='0' stdDeviation='20' flood-color='#FF4081' flood-opacity='0.8'/></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#ar1)'/><path d='M50,100 L150,100' stroke='url(#ar2)' stroke-width='35' stroke-linecap='round' filter='url(#shadow4)'/><path d='M130,80 L150,100 L130,120' stroke='#FFF' stroke-width='15' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' filter='url(#glow4)'/><circle cx='50' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FFEA00' filter='url(#glow4)'/><circle cx='150' cy='100' r='20' fill='#76FF03' filter='url(#glow4)'/></svg>
하늘들: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='sky1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#00E5FF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#2979FF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#00BFA5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='sky2' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#FFEA00;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF6F00;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='cloud1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.95'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow5'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='9' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow5'><feDropShadow dx='0' dy='0' stdDeviation='28' flood-color='#00E5FF' flood-opacity='0.9'/></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#sky1)'/><circle cx='150' cy='50' r='35' fill='url(#sky2)' filter='url(#shadow5)'/><ellipse cx='70' cy='120' rx='40' ry='25' fill='url(#cloud1)' filter='url(#glow5)'/><ellipse cx='90' cy='115' rx='35' ry='22' fill='url(#cloud1)' filter='url(#glow5)'/><ellipse cx='110' cy='120' rx='38' ry='24' fill='url(#cloud1)' filter='url(#glow5)'/><circle cx='40' cy='60' r='4' fill='#FFF' opacity='1'/><circle cx='55' cy='75' r='5' fill='#FFF' opacity='1'/><circle cx='130' cy='90' r='4' fill='#FFF' opacity='1'/><circle cx='160' cy='110' r='6' fill='#FFF' opacity='1'/></svg>
